WorkItem.ClosedComment: The element must be visible when initializing it as a jHtmlArea because of the way the browsers render HTML.
WorkItem.Description:
I got a problem when creating the WYSIWYG editor dynamically and attached to a dynamic element. It seems that the iframe of the editor is created yet and therefore the editor will throw an error when trying to access the contentdocument.
The error hit at line 318: var edit = this.editor = this.contentWindow.document;
Â 
I am still looking at a workaround.
WorkItem.Summary: Error hit when creating the editor dynamically and append to a dynamic element.
